name: OGame WBB4.1 - Dark style
description:
Dark style for the origin forum (screen prints are not factual, changes have been made since)

Choice of the addon for the sub-forum available just below (Advanced Style Settings)
⇓
additional_info:
=> origin thread => French thread ...:: Release notes ::... 14/12/17: [New] Creation of an add-on for sub-forums, choice available for activation or not. (screenshot available on Origin and French threads) 24/06/17: [Polishing] All forum information messages that are on a blue background 05/02/17 : [Polishing] Various graphic adjustment:
  • sub forum menu (thanks naynay)
  • voting module
  • description of the different forums for certain communities (DE & ES in particular)
  • various small adjustments
13/01/17 : [New] Improved links to sub-forum descriptions (under cover that they have not been manually edited) 09/01/17 : [Polishing] various graphic change [New] On the list of forums, the sub-forums have become of real button 28/11/16 : [Polishing] Graphic change on the mailbox 22/11/16 : [Polishing] Change color of all icons, for example: quote - reporting - sitemap - like ... 21/11/16 : [Polishing] various graphic change 18/11/16 : [Polishing] Changing the appearance of tables 15/11/16 : [Polishing] various graphic change 15/11/16 : [Polishing] various graphic change : button, icon lock, icon bookmark, badge for thread more discreet (for the main ) 13/11/16 : [Polishing] blockquote, blockcode, spoiler, avatar .... [New] Background color for the custom WYSIWYG in order to mitigate bugs 12/11/16 : [Polishing] various graphic change [New] The Quick Reply framework remains open. No need to click on the button :) [New] Updated it to work on all wbb4.1 OGame boards by default. 09/11/16 : [Polishing] navigation bar & menu connexion [Polishing] button [Polishing] search fields 24/07/16 : [Polishing] various graphic change 22/07/16 : creation

style_settings.label: add-on of sub-forum / add-on de sous forum

style_setting_options.label: yes / oui (default choice / choix par défaut)
